text: Kay Wingberg (born 1949) is a German mathematician at the University of Heidelberg. His research interests include algebraic number theory, Iwasawa theory, arithmetic geometry and the structure of profinite (or pro-p) groups == Publications == * with Jürgen Neukirch and Alexander Schmidt Cohomology of number fields. Springer 2000, second edition 2008, == References == * ==External links== *faculty page, University of Heidelberg Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century German mathematicians Category:Heidelberg University faculty Category:21st-century German mathematicians
title: Kay Wingberg
